snippet: Young adults are surging into the state and federal exchanges now that website glitches have been fixed.
abstract: Editorial welcomes report finding that enrollment has increased broadly across health insurance exchanges, and that uptick has been especially pronounced among young adults who are key to sustainability of the Affordable Care Act; disputes critics who say level of young participants is still far lower than necessary.
lead_paragraph: Young adults are surging into the state and federal exchanges now that website glitches have been fixed.

headline.main: A Good Start for Health Care Sign-Ups
headline.print_headline: A Good Start for Health Care Sign-Ups

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
